author: veithen
msg: Some improvements to the new axis2-repo-maven-plugin. In particular, collect AAR and MAR files not only from project dependencies, but also from submodules in a multimodule project.

author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-2412 Merge licenses into a single LICENSE file; rename the former NOTICE file to DEPENDENCIES and create a new NOTICE file only referring to components requesting explicit listing.

author: drobiazko
msg: TAP5-1098: Provide new SelectModelFactory service that can automatically build a standard SelectModel from objects and property names
